definition[0]: calculation that is based on a careful guess rather than on exact knowledge
example[0]: By my reckoning, we have 12,000 clients.
definition[1]: a time when you are judged or punished for your actions, or when they have results that affect you
example[1]: We know that you will not forget their crimes when their day of reckoning comes.
example[2]: In the final reckoning, the president failed to achieve his major goals.
